Text: If you`re looking for an MP3 version of this torrent on thepiratebay, you`re out of luck - for whatever reason, the site throws a file name error no matter what changes I make. The mp3 version is out there through other trackers - try one of them.
All right, MP3 version is now available. Thank you to TPB for having some bloody stupid ban on any text file that might actually include information on the band and album.
